name: RIOT
tagline: Think strategically and apply the digital presence
description:
We believe that there are no more boundaries between online and offline. It's all mixed. We specialize in creating these contact points between a brand and the consumer, either through an application, a game, a mobile experience, using technology - such as RFID, NFC - or any mechanism to help us connect people and brands.
We know what it takes to join the marks with people and platforms, wherever they are. That we understand.
